item.title: Obama Hands $52M To His AARP Buddies
item.description: Obama Hands $52M To His AARP Buddies | http://t.co/bTFIkQB6
item.content:encoded: Obama Hands $52M To His AARP Buddies | http://t.co/bTFIkQB6 Today, the Department of Labor proudly announced that it had given away some $260 million in grants to various organizations through its Senior Community Service Employment Program (SCSEP). SCSEP is “a community service and work-based training program for older workers – providing subsidized, part-time, community service training for unemployed, low-income persons 55 or older who have poor employment prospects.” Link - Trackbacks

item.title: 'NY Mag': Hitting Obama for 'You Didn't Build That' Is Racist
item.description: You knew this was coming --> 'New York Mag': Hitting Obama for 'You Didn't Build That' Is Racist -- http://t.co/pkTa4SzL
item.content:encoded: You knew this was coming --> 'New York Mag': Hitting Obama for 'You Didn't Build That' Is Racist -- http://t.co/pkTa4SzL With Rasmussen showing Romney enjoying a five-point lead (and that's a pollster everyone in media knows is reliable, which is why they prefer juiced NBC polls), the media is now in pure panic mode. Furthermore, Obama's Media Palace Guards know that when the full context is played of Obama's revealing "you didn't build that" quote, it's absolutely devastating for Obama because the full context of those comments show the President openly ridiculing America's small business owners. So what's a panicked media to do? Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.title: 男性がセックスのあと眠くなるのは仕方がないことが証明される / 専門家「脳が停止してしまうことが判明」
item.description: 男性がセックスのあと眠くなるのは仕方がないことが証明される / 専門家「脳が停止してしまうことが判明」 http://t.co/Lpbza1ZH - #sougo #followmeJP
item.content:encoded: 男性がセックスのあと眠くなるのは仕方がないことが証明される / 専門家「脳が停止してしまうことが判明」 http://t.co/Lpbza1ZH - #sougo #followmeJP セックスのあと、女性は甘い余韻を楽しむ傾向にあるのに対し、男性では眠くなる人が多いのではないだろうか。そんな男性を「冷たい」「愛情がない」と女性がなじるというのはよく聞く話だ。 研究によると男性のセックスのあとの眠気はコントロールできるものではないということがわかった。それは大脳が停止してしまうためだというのである。 … Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: rocketnews24.com

item.title: Which Social Platform Really Drives the Most Traffic? | Social Media Today
item.description: Hot, Fresh, Original NEWS! Business leaders - where do YOU think social media traffic comes from? http://t.co/p8oARkyq
item.content:encoded: Hot, Fresh, Original NEWS! Business leaders - where do YOU think social media traffic comes from? http://t.co/p8oARkyq In preparing for our morning show we were doing some research and came across an old story that showed that StumbleUpon was actually driving more traffic than FaceBook in January of 2011 and we wondered two things about that - firstly, is it still true, and secondly what would that mean for internet marketing and social media experts who stake Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: socialmediatoday.com

item.title: The NHS did not deserve to be so disgracefully glorified in this bizarre spectacle of left-wing propaganda
item.description: So apparently we shouldn't celebrate the NHS because sometimes they cock up http://t.co/s6jUEgtz x #olympicopeningceremony x
item.content:encoded: So apparently we shouldn't celebrate the NHS because sometimes they cock up http://t.co/s6jUEgtz x #olympicopeningceremony x RICK DEWSBURY: How does the family of Kane Gorney, who died of thirst in his hospital bed, feel when they see the NHS being shamefully glorified at the biggest sporting bonanza in the world? , RICK DEWSBURY: How does the family of Kane Gorney, who died of thirst in his hospital bed, feel when they see the NHS being shamefully glorified at the biggest sporting bonanza in the world? Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Policeman assaulting and pepper-spraying a disabled man on a tricycle
item.description: I've just witnessed how police assaulted a disabled man on a tricycle http://t.co/uS1f2VAa #London2012 #criticalmass
item.content:encoded: I've just witnessed how police assaulted a disabled man on a tricycle http://t.co/uS1f2VAa #London2012 #criticalmass 27 July 2012 During monthly critical mass ride policeman has assaulted a disabled man, who was stationary on his motorized tricycle. Later police arrested this man despite the presence more than a dozen witnesses that testified in his defence. Unfortunately, I was unable to film everything. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: youtube.com
